featured.text: As a result, the astronauts have swollen, puffy faces, very much resembling that of the round-headed Charlie Brown in the famous comic strip.

definition.zh_def: 膨脹，增大或變得更強，通常指液體或氣體的運動。
definition.en_def: To increase in size or volume, often due to pressure or external forces.
definition.example: The river began to swell after the heavy rain.
